result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:23 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Michael Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Stephanie Schmidt with Intern Lanie Krause in court. Defendant Shane Allen Goossens in court, in custody. Intern Krause states DE was transported from Pierce Co yesterday as DE was serving a sentence. Court sets STC in Branch 4. Court quashed warrant and reinstates bond. Adjourned 01:27 PM
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

to schedule zoom appearance. Filed by DE. arc   Per RMW: schedule a return on warrant. Zoom approved. (on today's in-custody intake list) tfy
Body only. Statewide. Signed by EFV 8/24/22. ec: attys, c: SCSO.  gll

10:02 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Defendant Shane Allen Goossens not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Erin of VW appeared. Hallway called. Set for Return on Warrant. Court reviews file. ADA Rockow requests body only warrant. Based upon Defendant's non-appearance, Court issues body only warrant statewide. Adjourned at 10:03 AM.  gll

10:05 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shane Allen Goossens not in court. Atty James Selmer is attorney of record however, that may not be accurate. Court issues WARRANT - STAYED.
Return on warrant scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Return on warrant on August 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Settlement conference on June 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on August 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Melissa  C.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Holly Elkin Rockow   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Shane Allen Goossens appeared from jail via video. DE has a copy of complaint. Address and DOB confirmed. Understands charges and penalties. Atty Harrelson states he qualifies for PD services. Waives further reading. Enters NG plea and reserves on all pre plea rights. DE currently on a PO HOLD. Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Settlement conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
